data.persona: I am a young child from the community within the kingdom. I am a peasant and have no father. I live with the others.
data.description:
You are in the Horse's stables.
The stables smell terrible, and are riddled with brown feces on the ground. The horses are tame and magnificent brown. The open plains are yellow and green with grass.
There's a harness, a horse, a feces, a tack room, and a Open plain here.
The horse caretaker/trainer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the horse trainer because I'm upset and want to lash out.
data.mid_motivation: I want to lash out because I've been told to muck the stables today and I don't want to.
data.long_motivation: I'm tired of mucking the stables, being poor, and child work. I want to smash the trainer's nose and run away!

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: use Big Shovel with Manure Pile

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Horse tack in Brown Horse
